classInfo.name: Abby Fleming
classInfo.aboutMe: I'm a wedding photographer turned full stack developer. Over a hundred weddings later, I'm looking forward to reclaiming my weekends! Coding allows me to be creative and analytical.

classInfo.name: Alex Simonian
classInfo.aboutMe: Fascinated with the notion of how self-reference and formal rules allow systems to acquire meaning despite being made of 'meaningless' elements. Oh, I also like coffee.

classInfo.name: Ali Kimbrell
classInfo.aboutMe: Software development inspires me because through it, people come together in real and meaningful ways. Technology helps bridge the gaps across geography and generations. Playing a part in that is both an adventure and a privilege.

classInfo.name: Ben Marks
classInfo.aboutMe: I am former welder, artist, actor, CAD operator, surveyor, and civil engineering technician. I love my wife, my daughters, my dogs, Nashville and solving new puzzles!

classInfo.name: Dani Adkins
classInfo.aboutMe: A lover of technology, travel, books and the outdoors. 'Awesome spontaneous dance moves' -Ike, C16; 'You're from Indiana. Shouldn't you be funny?' -Shawn, C16; 'Your docstrings are grand!' -Ben, C16

classInfo.name: Drew Martin
classInfo.aboutMe: I have always had a passion for problem-solving. Coming from an automotive repair background, coding is the perfect mixture of complex problem solving, and creative design. I find enjoyment out of taking a client's idea and making it come to life using code.

classInfo.name: Ike Nwaelele
classInfo.aboutMe: Smiler, fosterer of kind teams, and obsessed w/ growing. I spent 6 years in tech as a PM before channeling my inner-nerd for a s/w immersion. Ultimately, I seek to bridge my love for strategy & tech!

classInfo.name: Jack Pinkston
classInfo.aboutMe: Nashville based software developer with a passion for learning

classInfo.name: Joey Kirby
classInfo.aboutMe: A South African-born Canadian-American business magnate, investor, engineer, and inventor. Founder, CEO, and CTO of SpaceX; co-founder, CEO, and product architect of Tesla Inc.; co-founder and chairma

classInfo.name: Julia Kim-Chung
classInfo.aboutMe: Previously having worked in the hospitality management, Absolutely thrilled to use problem solving skills with my mathematically driven logical sense in the programming every day

classInfo.name: LaDonna Sales
classInfo.aboutMe: LaDonna is a student of NSS, Cohort 16.

classInfo.name: Mark Ellis
classInfo.aboutMe: Formerly a Video Crew Chief for many musicians/bands you probably recognize. Iâ€™m supplied by an endless determination and a love for problem solving. Application development feeds my curiosity.

classInfo.name: Matthew McCord
classInfo.aboutMe: I spent most of my post high school graduation time working on a career in music, while still keeping up on my coding hobby, and now I am going full force in to the world of software development.

classInfo.name: Nathan T. Baker
classInfo.aboutMe: Nashville software engineer, President of Can Can Awards, and board game connoisseur.

classInfo.name: Nick Chemsak
classInfo.aboutMe: Automating audio recording processes while writing and producing the music soundtrack for two independent films is where I discovered coding as a new and exciting creative outlet that I wanted to pursue. I am an avid painter and graphic designer, and just recently designed my first online art store, Ephemeral Wave. I also love playing drums, sequencing music, and spending time with my young son and wife!

classInfo.name: Richard Whitfield
classInfo.aboutMe: I make music with Javascript and Python!

classInfo.name: Richard Van Sickle
classInfo.aboutMe: Former grad of the University of Tennessee-Knoxville. I worked in inside sales out of college only to find that was not the career path I wanted to head down. Coding has opened up a world of opportunities and could not be happier with my decision to join NSS!

classInfo.name: Sam Phillips
classInfo.aboutMe: Creativity enthusiast with exploratory tendencies and a passion for bringing new ideas to life.

classInfo.name: Steven Holmes
classInfo.aboutMe: 10 years spent living in the Philippines, 10 years spent as a professional musician. Penchant for design, learning & efficient systems. Early on at NSS, I had a dream in Javascript, and things haven't been the same since.

classInfo.name: Trent Hand
classInfo.aboutMe: An inquisitive and outspoken teammate, always willing to learn and teach what he's picked up.  Lover of books, food, code, and all things nerdy.

classInfo.name: Zachary Cline
classInfo.aboutMe: Coming from the service industry, I am looking forward to a challenging career solving problems creatively with code!

classInfo.name: Zoe LeBlanc
classInfo.aboutMe: Hi! I'm a historian who discovered a love for writing code. I'm currently finishing up my dissertation at Vanderbilt, and am looking to futher my development skills with a great team. I love solving problems, sharing ideas, and learning new things.
